summary: Also known as Yemoja (Yemoja, Yemaya, Iemanja). Associated with Yeye Omo Eja (Mother Whose Children Are Fish), Mama Wata, Olokun Omo (Child of Olokun), Yemowo, Ibu. Known as Yeye Omo Eja (Mother Whose Children Are Fish). Symbolized by ocean waves.
epithets: Yeye Omo Eja (Mother Whose Children Are Fish)
description: Also known as Yemoja (Yemoja, Yemaya, Iemanja). Associated with Yeye Omo Eja (Mother Whose Children Are Fish), Mama Wata, Olokun Omo (Child of Olokun), Yemowo, Ibu. Known as Yeye Omo Eja (Mother Whose Children Are Fish). Symbolized by ocean waves.
domains: Yeye Omo Eja (Mother Whose Children Are Fish)
title: Yoruba - Yemoja - Mother of Waters and Fertility

relationships.consort: in many traditions. their union represents the union of water and land
